participant_1.background:
I do my laundry when I run out of clean clothes.
i collect stray people like crazy cat ladys collect cats.
I am not close with my family, but I am close to my friends and the people I volunteer with.
i always seem to be losing things , most recently , my mind.
My parents are my heroes.

participant_2.background:
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
i had to call 911 when i had a terrible headache.
i like to take drives in the country.
i wish i had money to travel.
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I'm doing well also, thank you. What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy writing in my blog, taking drives in the country, and watching my lizard, Gila, bask in the sun.
That sounds fun! I enjoy volunteering and spending time with my friends and family. I also have a habit of losing things, like my keys and wallet.
Oh no! That must be frustrating. I'm glad you have hobbies that you enjoy.
Thank you. I'm glad you have hobbies that you enjoy as well. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a lizard named Gila. He's a green anole.
That's awesome! I've never had a lizard before.
They're pretty cool pets. They're low maintenance and don't require a lot of space.
That's good to know. I might have to look into getting one.
I'd recommend it! They're great companions.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely look into it.
